Body:
"""
        Test that a ValueError gets raised when attempting to write an
        AttestationCredential struct missing both attestation measurement and
        attestation assertion data to a data stream.
        """
credential = objects.AttestationCredential(nonce=objects.Nonce(nonce_id=
    b'\x01', nonce_value=b'\x00\x01\x02\x03\x04\x05\x06\x07'),
    attestation_type=enums.AttestationType.TPM_QUOTE)
stream = utils.BytearrayStream()
args = stream,
self.assertRaisesRegex(ValueError,
    'Attestation credential struct is missing either the attestation measurement or the attestation assertion.'
    , credential.write, *args)
